SEARCH
Module it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47
Package it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.utils

Class GameSaver

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.utils.GameSaver
public class GameSaver extends Object
This class is used to save the current status of the game by the controller. It saves the controller status onto 1 + numOfPlayers different files (one for the controller and the mainTable, the other for each player's playerTable) and the deck status onto 4 different files (one for each different deck). This class can also be used to load the last available save onto the server and to check if such save is available in the first place. Lastly, it is used to reset the game files once the game has ended.
